actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Archerâ€™s Eye (3/Day)
bonusActions.description: Immediately after making an attack roll or a damage roll with a ranged weapon, the archer can roll a d10 and add the number rolled to the total.
